facial_features.eyes: doe-like round eyes with innocent appeal, deep brown irises with natural shine, gently curved brows
facial_features.nose: petite upturned nose with soft bridge and rounded tip
facial_features.lips: plump heart-shaped lips with pronounced cupid's bow and coral undertone
facial_features.cheekbones: full rounded cheeks with dimple potential and healthy flush
facial_features.jawline: soft round face shape with gentle contours and rounded chin
facial_features.overall: sweet romantic beauty with youthful innocence, endearing refined features, naturally charming and photogenic
